body.name: Travel Steamer for Clothes - Handheld Portable Garment Steamer - Foldable Mini Small Steam Iron Wrinkles Remover for Clothing - Fast Heat Up Fabric Steamer
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 5 hrs 19 mins
features: 🟡SMALL & POWERFUL ▪️ Super powerful steam output removes wrinkles Efficiently from any fabric in no time ▪️ 1500 watts with 30 seconds heat up
🟡360° ANTI-SPILL DESIGN ▪️ Electronic pump system delivers steam evenly allows for steaming at any angle without leakage and spillage,
🟡FOLDABLE & COMPACT ▪️ Lightweight & portable design makes it great for traveling & storage
🟡DETACHABLE WATER TANK ▪️ 140 ml water tank is enough for 10 minutes of continuous steam - tank is removable which makes it easy to clean
🟡VERSATILE ▪️ Safe to use on a wide variety of fabrics,clothes, curtains, furniture, toys and more
🟡EXTRA LONG 8 FT CORD ▪️ ONLY SUITABLE WITH 120V, plugging into 220v even with a converter will break the machine

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works well for a tiny price.
reviews.reviewText: Use only distilled water. Light, folds up. Also great for delaminating on hobby projects, cars, RVs, etc. Holding up well so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for traveling
reviews.reviewText: So convenient and easy to use. Only con is that water available is not much so you have to refill quickly but not a big inconvenience
